hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT JOB_ID, OWNER_CODE, SKU_CODE, SKU_STATUS, IN_QTY_EA, QTY_EA, OUT_QTY_EA, COMPANY_CODE, SITE_CODE, REC_VER, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_STATUS, TIME_ZONE FROM EO_SITE_INV WHERE 1=1 <<AND JOB_ID = :jobId>> <<AND OWNER_CODE = :ownerCode>> <<AND SKU_CODE = :skuCode>> <<AND SKU_STATUS = :skuStatus>>
<<AND SKU_CODE in (:skuCodes)>> <<AND SKU_STATUS in (:skuStatues)>>
<<AND IN_QTY_EA = :inQtyEa>> <<AND QTY_EA = :qtyEa>> <<AND OUT_QTY_EA = :outQtyEa>> <<AND COMPANY_CODE = :companyCode>> <<AND SITE_CODE = :siteCode>> <<AND REC_VER = :recVer>> <<AND CREATOR = :creator>> <<AND CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND MODIFIER = :modifier>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND REC_STATUS = :recStatus>> <<AND TIME_ZONE = :timeZone>>
